message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid further complications.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation is hurting you more than me.
The inflation is hurting me, Bob, but let's be reasonable. This is my counter-offer.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, Alice. I think it's time for me to take a bigger slice.
This is getting us nowhere, Bob. Let's split it evenly and be done with it.
I'm being generous considering the inflation is really hurting your share now. This is a good deal for you.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I walk in the next round. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll still take a deal that's slightly worse for you.
You were right, Bob. I was bluffing. Take it all.
